name: Commuter Rush XD - Prototype
description:
Push, swerve, rush! It’s 08:15 Monday morning, you have a 47 minute commute and the mandatory annual corporate palooza is beginning at 09:00 sharp. Drop the civility, set your sights on the one empty seat on the tube and RUSH!!!

Controls

  • You automatically run forwards
  • Left/Right arrows to move side-to-side
  • Collect brown coffee to use a boost (up arrow)
  • Avoid the red enemies... everyone else is fair game

This is a low-level prototype for my game Commuter Rush XD. The prototype only comes with one level at the moment, basic graphics, basic settings and a basic menu... it's all pretty basic but should give a good idea of what I want to achieve.

Credits: Everything from the code to the lighting is made by Daryl (Bard) Peel
